#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;

char l[20005], k[20005];
int l1, l2;
bool ans;
void calculate();

int main()
{
	int t;

	cin >> t;

	while (t--)
	{
		cin >> l >> k;

		calculate();
		
		if (ans)
		{
			cout << "1" << endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cout << "0" << endl;
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
void calculate()
{
	int i;

	l1 = strlen(l);
	l2 = strlen(k);

	ans = false;

	//cout << l << " " << k << endl;
	//cout << l1 << " " << l2 << endl;

	if (l1 == l2 + 1)
	{
		for (i = 0; i < l1; i++)
		{
			if (l[i] != k[i])
			{
				//cout << "i=" << i << " in" << endl;

				if (strcmp(l + i + 1, k + i)==0)
				{
					//cout << "i=" << i <<" "<< l + i + 1 << " " << k + 1 << endl;
					ans = true;
				}
				else
				{
					ans = false;
				}
				break;
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		ans = false;
	}
}
